description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * Reports To: 	Senior Merchandiser / Merchandiser Manager
              
              Direct Reports: non
              
              Indirect Reports: non
              

              * Responsibilities:
              
              - Manage vendors from offered capacity, updated forecast, fill rate, pull forward, material status, production schedule, shipping schedule
              
              - Verify all impacts to orders (development, cost, lead time, mould..) for both samples and Bulk shipments in advance to have best deliveries
              
              - Give best supports to CS team, Subs and Distributors for shipment status and satisfy the requests
              
              - Effectively evaluate and report on vendor performance, agree and execute improvement plans through vendor scorecard and timely reports
              
              - Proactive actions in planning to support vendors to achieve requested shipment dates, monitors production status and inputs, quantity, delivery and shipment details into SAP
              
              - Manages vendor relationships for day-to-day operations in terms of service level agreement and the calendar milestones
              
              - Manage stocks to ensure all required actions/communications implemented following customers needed without any quality issue
              
              - Responsible for vendor’s KPI, build up the vendor’s capability to adhere all SOP, process, timeline, expectations, support RMM on the action plans of improvements for each vendor
              
              - Minimize the storage charges, material costs, tooling cost and all related costs in shipments
              
              - Manage claims with vendors, customers and quality team effectively and beneficially
              
              - Collaborates with cross teams for issues resolutions if any production and/or quality issues arise
              
              - Co-ordinates with nominated Freight forward on vessel booking and update shipment status.
              
              - Represents our brand within the vendor base, ensure vendors to follow all requested labelling/packaging and shipping instructions.
              
              - Support and demonstrate the Brand values within the work environment.
              
              - Support the other teams to remove gap of communication or understanding
              
              - Build team relationship and team spirit
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	At least 5 years’ merchandising experience
              
              •	Experience in relevant product categories is preferable, but not essential
              
              •	Sound knowledge of supply chain management on global basis
              
              •	Effective calendar management in an international brand, retail or FMCG environment
              
              •	Experienced in working with multi-counterparts (factory, head quarter and customers) and ability to drive performance
              
              •	Knowledge of product costing and product development
              
              •	Good analytical skills, problem solving skills and attention to details
              
              •	Can-do attitude, while willing and able to come up with practical solutions when problems arise
              
              •	Ability to self-manage, prioritise and multi-tasks
              
              •	Ability to work both independently & as part of a team
              
              •	Experienced in working effectively across multiple functions in a global business
              
              •	Strong communications skills in a multi-cultural environment
              
              •	Strong influencing and persuasion skills
              
              •	Knowledge in SAP or other ERP systems is required
              
              •	PC literate: Excel and PowerPoint
              
              •	Good command of written and spoken English
              
              •	Discipline, ethical, responsible, careful
              
              •	Good time management and team work
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
